content.d: Oh, Yu. What are you watching?
It’s a video of our last live show.
Really!? Lanzhu wants to see too!
Sure, come sit next to me~
Hey, hey, did you already watch Lanzhu’s part?
Amazing! I couldn’t take my eyes off of you, Lanzhu-chan!
That’s a given! Not just on stage, but you’ve got to keep an eye on the regular Lanzhu too! Come on, Yu, face this way!
Ahaha, I'll always look into your eyes, Lanzhu-chan!
